id , code , external_code , return_code , in_depot_code , original_delivery_code , return_type , return_in_depot_id , return_in_depot_name , return_in_depot_code , return_in_create_date , return_in_date , amount , currency , store_platform_code , buyer_name , buyer_phone , return_addr , postcode , logistics_name , logistics_way_bill_no , shop_code , shop_name , order_return_source , merchant_name , merchant_id , status , creater , create_name , create_date , modifier , modifier_name , modify_date , auditor , audit_name , audit_date , shop_type_code , customer_id , customer_name , refund_end_date , after_sale_type , total_refund_amount , return_order_type , trade_refund_amount , trade_refund_tax , order_id , order_code , refund_remark , is_generate , tallying_unit ,

where.trim: id= #{id} and code= #{code} and external_code= #{externalCode} and return_code= #{returnCode} and in_depot_code= #{inDepotCode} and original_delivery_code= #{originalDeliveryCode} and return_type= #{returnType} and return_in_depot_id= #{returnInDepotId} and return_in_depot_name= #{returnInDepotName} and return_in_depot_code= #{returnInDepotCode} and return_in_create_date= #{returnInCreateDate} and return_in_date= #{returnInDate} and amount= #{amount} and currency= #{currency} and store_platform_code= #{storePlatformCode} and buyer_name= #{buyerName} and buyer_phone= #{buyerPhone} and return_addr= #{returnAddr} and postcode= #{postcode} and logistics_name= #{logisticsName} and logistics_way_bill_no= #{logisticsWayBillNo} and shop_code= #{shopCode} and shop_name= #{shopName} and order_return_source= #{orderReturnSource} and merchant_name= #{merchantName} and merchant_id= #{merchantId} and status= #{status} and creater= #{creater} and create_name= #{createName} and create_date= #{createDate} and modifier= #{modifier} and modifier_name= #{modifierName} and modify_date= #{modifyDate} and auditor= #{auditor} and audit_name= #{auditName} and audit_date= #{auditDate} and shop_type_code= #{shopTypeCode} and customer_id= #{customerId} and customer_name= #{customerName} and refund_end_date= #{refundEndDate} and after_sale_type= #{afterSaleType} and total_refund_amount= #{totalRefundAmount} and return_order_type= #{returnOrderType} and trade_refund_amount= #{tradeRefundAmount} and trade_refund_tax= #{tradeRefundTax} and order_id= #{orderId} and order_code= #{orderCode} and refund_remark=#{refundRemark} and is_generate= #{isGenerate} and tallying_unit= #{tallyingUnit} and status != "006" and

t.merchant_id= #{merchantId} and t.external_code= #{externalCode} and t.in_depot_code= #{inDepotCode} and
date_format(refund_end_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') >= #{returnInCreateStartDate} and
date_format(refund_end_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') <= #{returnInCreateEndDate} and

#{id}
and
t.external_code in
#{externalCode}
and
t.return_code in
#{returnCode}
and
t.status != "006" and

select t.*,t1.goods_id,t1.goods_name,t1.return_num,t1.bad_goods_num,t1.price,t1.dec_total,t1.goods_code,t1.barcode,t1.goods_no from t_order_return_idepot t left join t_order_return_idepot_item t1 on t1.oreturn_idepot_id=t.id
order by t.id desc

amount= #{amount} and currency= #{currency} and store_platform_code= #{storePlatformCode} and buyer_name= #{buyerName} and buyer_phone= #{buyerPhone} and return_addr= #{returnAddr} and postcode= #{postcode} and logistics_name= #{logisticsName} and logistics_way_bill_no= #{logisticsWayBillNo} and shop_code= #{shopCode} and shop_name= #{shopName} and order_return_source= #{orderReturnSource} and merchant_name= #{merchantName} and merchant_id= #{merchantId} and status= #{status} and creater= #{creater} and create_name= #{createName} and create_date= #{createDate} and modifier= #{modifier} and modifier_name= #{modifierName} and modify_date= #{modifyDate} and auditor= #{auditor} and audit_name= #{auditName} and audit_date= #{auditDate} and after_sale_type= #{afterSaleType} and is_generate= #{isGenerate} and t.id in

select t.*,t2.in_goods_id,t2.in_goods_code,t2.in_goods_name,t2.in_goods_no,t2.barcode, t2.commbarcode,t2.return_num,t2.bad_goods_num,(t5.return_num+t5.bad_goods_num) as batchTotalNum, t2.price,t2.dec_total,t5.return_num as batchReturnNum,t5.bad_goods_num as batchBadGoodsNum, t5.batch_no,t5.production_date,t5.overdue_date, t2.refund_amount, t2.bu_name,t2.trade_refund_amount,t2.trade_refund_tax, t.return_code, t2.stock_location_type_name from t_order_return_idepot t left join t_order_return_idepot_item t2 on t.id = t2.oreturn_idepot_id left join t_order_return_idepot_batch t5 on t5.item_id=t2.id
order by t.create_date desc

select date_format(t.create_date,'%m-%d') as days,count(id) as count from t_order_return_idepot t where t.create_date between '${startDate}' and '${endDate}' and t.merchant_id= #{merchantId} and t.status != "006" group by days

INSERT INTO t_order_return_idepot
id, code, external_code, return_code, in_depot_code, original_delivery_code, return_type, return_in_depot_id, return_in_depot_name, return_in_depot_code, return_in_create_date, return_in_date, amount, currency, store_platform_code, buyer_name, buyer_phone, return_addr, postcode, logistics_name, logistics_way_bill_no, shop_code, shop_name, order_return_source, merchant_name, merchant_id, status, creater, create_name, create_date, modifier, modifier_name, modify_date, auditor, audit_name, audit_date, shop_type_code, customer_id, customer_name, refund_end_date, after_sale_type, total_refund_amount, return_order_type, trade_refund_amount, trade_refund_tax, order_id, order_code, refund_remark, is_generate
VALUES
#{item.id}, #{item.code}, #{item.externalCode}, #{item.returnCode}, #{item.inDepotCode}, #{item.originalDeliveryCode}, #{item.returnType}, #{item.returnInDepotId}, #{item.returnInDepotName}, #{item.returnInDepotCode}, #{item.returnInCreateDate}, #{item.returnInDate}, #{item.amount}, #{item.currency}, #{item.storePlatformCode}, #{item.buyerName}, #{item.buyerPhone}, #{item.returnAddr}, #{item.postcode}, #{item.logisticsName}, #{item.logisticsWayBillNo}, #{item.shopCode}, #{item.shopName}, #{item.orderReturnSource}, #{item.merchantName}, #{item.merchantId}, #{item.status}, #{item.creater}, #{item.createName}, #{item.createDate}, #{item.modifier}, #{item.modifierName}, #{item.modifyDate}, #{item.auditor}, #{item.auditName}, #{item.auditDate}, #{item.shopTypeCode}, #{item.customerId}, #{item.customerName}, #{item.refundEndDate}, #{item.afterSaleType}, #{item.totalRefundAmount}, #{item.returnOrderType}, #{item.tradeRefundAmount}, #{item.tradeRefundTax}, #{item.orderId}, #{item.orderCode}, #{item.refundRemark}, #{item.isGenerate}
mapper.select: select from t_order_return_idepot t

select count(distinct(external_code)) from t_order_return_idepot
status= '013' and return_order_type = '0' and
date_format(refund_end_date,'%Y-%m') = #{month} and
merchant_id= #{merchantId} and shop_code= #{shopCode} and shop_type_code= #{shopTypeCode} and store_platform_code= #{storePlatformCode} and
external_code is not null and
order by external_code

select distinct(external_code) as externalCode from t_order_return_idepot
status= '013' and return_order_type = '0' and
date_format(refund_end_date,'%Y-%m') = #{month} and
merchant_id= #{merchantId} and shop_code= #{shopCode} and shop_type_code= #{shopTypeCode} and store_platform_code= #{storePlatformCode} and
external_code is not null and
order by externalCode limit #{begin},#{pageSize}
